scripts.publish: pnpm build && pnpm changeset publish --access public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release-deploy: pnpm release:prepare && pnpm changeset && pnpm changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "Version Packages" && pnpm publish && pnpm build:storybook && pnpm deploy:storybook
scripts.release-deploy:major: pnpm release:prepare && pnpm changeset major && pnpm changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "Version Packages" && pnpm publish && pnpm build:storybook && pnpm deploy:storybook
scripts.release-deploy:minor: pnpm release:prepare && pnpm changeset minor && pnpm changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "Version Packages" && pnpm publish && pnpm build:storybook && pnpm deploy:storybook
scripts.release:major: pnpm changeset major && pnpm changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "Version Packages" && pnpm publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm changeset minor && pnpm changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "Version Packages" && pnpm publish
scripts.release:patch: pnpm changeset patch && pnpm changeset version && git add . && git commit -m "Version Packages" && pnpm publish
